groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e26eh","text":"The dispersed samples were shipped from PRODOLABS. Prior to scRNA-seq dispersed samples from brain dead donor's pancreatic islets were recovered and dissociated as follows. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":40,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3uer2","text":"NOTE: Before beginning cell dissociation coat all the materials (pipettes, tubes, etc.) with PIM-S001GMP media to prevent sticking. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmg6c","text":"Transfer cell suspension of pure islets to a new 50ml tube. Use additional media to rinse original container.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6l7f7","text":"Centrifuge at room temperature 130g for 5 mins. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3lnh2","text":"Aspirate the supernatant and add media to the appropriate concentration of 1,000 islets/1 ml.        --\u003e Ex: If receiving 7,000 islets, use 7 ml media.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"22sno","text":"To recover cells, add half of the islets to a coated flask and incubate at 37C overnight.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9euen","text":"Coat pipette and add islets from flask to a 50ml tube. Wash flask with media to make sure all islets have been collected.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"72g6h","text":"Centrifuge at 130 g, room temperature for 2 mins.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ertia","text":"Aspirate media and resuspend in 4 ml accutase. Incubate at 37C for 8 mins, mixing with pipette every 2 mins. Check at 6 mins.                                                                                                                                      --\u003e1 mL accutase/1,000 islets","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"47qr8","text":"Add CMRL 1066 (Cat. 11530037) media to 25 ml then centrifuge at 230 g.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d0njk","text":"Aspirate supernatant and resuspend in 1.5 ml of CMRL","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"el2m5","text":"Filter through a 40 µm Flowmi.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"962s","text":"Count cells using AO/PI (acridine orage/propidium iodide) Cell Viability Kit for Luna-FL automated cell counter.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"blhgu","text":"Proceed to cell fixation.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dijnm","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bhrdc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Fixation of Cells & Nuclei for Chromium Fixed RNA Profiling
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7mj8e","text":"Cells were fixated prior to scRNAseq according to https://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.[...] /v1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
